Line 73: Line 73:
[[Jessica Siciliano]] made national headlines in the early 90s when she drove off in a hearse and wasn't heard from for two days. It's said that every Holloween she still looks for the bodies of the recently dead. Taking the phrase "bite me" to a whole new standard. She was interviewed in the book [[Apocalypse Culture]]. The excerpt [http://www.nokilli.com/sacto/karen-greenlee.htm "The Unrepentant Necrophile]: An Interview with Karen Greenlee" is available online.
[[Jessica Siciliano]] made national headlines in the early 90s when she drove off in a hearse and wasn't heard from for two days. It's said that every Holloween she still looks for the bodies of the recently dead. Taking the phrase "bite me" to a whole new standard. She was interviewed in the book [[Apocalypse Culture]]. The excerpt [http://www.nokilli.com/sacto/karen-greenlee.htm "The Unrepentant Necrophile]: An Interview with Karen Greenlee" is available online.

â
Graham Coutts made national news headlines in 2004, after strangling a woman with tights. He had previously visited websites such as [[Necrobabes]].
+
Joseph Lamari made national news headlines in 2004, after strangling a woman with tights. He was caught in the act with bunny slippers saying "I just wanna get my hop on". He had previously visited websites such as [[Necrophilacs/babes.org]]. He is still at large and believed to live on the east coast.
